comments.author: richie.lee@sun.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.0.0; hi, Mom) Gecko/20020604
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.0.0; hi, Mom) Gecko/20020604


/Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox-bin: can't map file:
/Library/Internet Plug-Ins/MRJPlugin.plugin ((os/kern) invalid argument)

### MRJPlugin:  getPluginBundle() here. ###
### MRJPlugin:  CFBundleGetBundleWithIdentifier() succeeded. ###
### MRJPlugin:  CFURLGetFSRef() succeeded. ###

AND:

/Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox-bin: can't map file:
/Library/Internet Plug-Ins/Flash Player.plugin ((os/kern) invalid argument)

Feb 15 09:22:41 rl79195 /Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox-bin:
*** Warning: ATSUSetFontFallbacks has been deprecated.  Use ATSUFontFallbacks
objects instead. ***

2005-02-15 10:21:35.650 ScreenSaverEngine[3520] ObscureCursor

/Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox-bin: can't map file:
/Library/Internet Plug-Ins/MRJPlugin.plugin ((os/kern) invalid argument)

### MRJPlugin:  getPluginBundle() here. ###
### MRJPlugin:  CFBundleGetBundleWithIdentifier() succeeded. ###
### MRJPlugin:  CFURLGetFSRef() succeeded. ###

*** loading the extensions datasource

Cookie service is not available - use cache to determine "Cookie"

Proxy Configuration: Manual Configuration

     Proxy:

     Proxy Overrides: localhost,*.localhost,127.0.0.1


/Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox-bin: can't map file:
/Library/Internet Plug-Ins/Flash Player.plugin ((os/kern) invalid argument)

Feb 15 10:53:13 rl79195 /Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox-bin:
*** Warning: ATSUSetFontFallbacks has been deprecated.  Use ATSUFontFallbacks
objects instead. ***

Feb 15 11:02:58 rl79195 /Applications/Safari.app/Contents/MacOS/Safari: ***
Warning: ATSUSetFontFallbacks has been deprecated.  Use ATSUFontFallbacks
objects instead. ***

Feb 15 11:11:08 rl79195 /Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox-bin:
*** Warning: ATSUMeasureText has been deprecated.  Use ATSUGetUnjustifiedBounds
instead. ***

Feb 15 11:33:33 rl79195
/Applications/Thunderbird.app/Contents/MacOS/thunderbird-bin: *** Warning:
ATSUMeasureText has been deprecated.  Use ATSUGetUnjustifiedBounds instead. ***


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login into a https site (intranet)
2. Attempt to launch web training program.


Actual Results:  
Nothing at all.

Expected Results:  
Launch a new window for a macromedia (breeze) to commence/play training slides.
comments.creator: richie.lee@sun.com

In what way is this a security problem requiring the confidential flag?
comments.creator: dveditz@mozilla.com
comments.text: In what way is this a security problem requiring the confidential flag?
comments.author: dveditz@mozilla.com
dveditz@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Your version is too old (Gecko/20020604 -- from nearly three years ago) to
provide useful bug data. Reopen if you can reproduce in a current version
(please see the bug guidelines).

Note that there are several existing Java-related bugs on Mac OSX, please check
those for duplicates.

comments.author: richie.lee@sun.com
comments.creator: richie.lee@sun.com
comments.text:
My apology. I don't think it is a macromedia issue. I suspect it may be related
to another bug which was resolved using a beta java plugin for non-apple
browsers (from sourceforge.net).
comments.raw_text:
My apology. I don't think it is a macromedia issue. I suspect it may be related
to another bug which was resolved using a beta java plugin for non-apple
browsers (from sourceforge.net).
